72bbb368-5a0d-41d5-a08f-cfdced2142b9.name: WH-RF400 Home Wireless Headphones
about_us: Wireless closed-type headphones with a range of up to 150 ft
Noise reduction system reproduces a clearer sound
1.57" driver unit delivers a wide frequency range
Built-in automatic tuning for high quality transmission
Listen for longer with up to 20 hours of battery life

Zone out and tune in: Zone out and tune inNoise-reducing technology keeps the wireless signal free of interference from other electronic devices, so you can enjoy your favorite film, soundtrack, or game with crystal-clear sound.
150-ft wireless range: 150-ft wireless rangeThe enhanced range from the transmitter dock lets you to move from room to room without losing an audio connection.
Up to 20 hours of play time: Up to 20 hours of play timeEnjoy your favorite shows, music, and films without having to charge for up to 20 hours.
Dynamic detail with 1.57\" drivers: Dynamic detail with 1.57" driversFrom thunderous booms to soft whispers, the large 1.57" drivers will make sure that you experience every detail in clear and precise sound quality.
Freedom to roam throughout your home: Freedom to roam throughout your homeWith a long battery life and wide reception range, you can take your favorite films and shows with you as you wander around your home-so you'll never miss out on the action again.
Surround yourself with high-quality soun: Surround yourself with high-quality soundWith a closed cap design, dynamic drivers, and Voice Mode button, sound quality is increased while noise and distractions from the outside world are reduced-leaving you to enjoy your entertainment in peace.
Vocal clarity with Voice Mode: Vocal clarity with Voice ModeEnjoy clearer speech across every show and enhanced vocals on every song with a touch of the Voice Mode button.
Designed for minimal distractions: Designed for minimal distractionsThe closed cup ear pad design helps you to block out the outside world, and immerse yourself in a world of entertainment.
Relax and get comfortable: Relax and get comfortableWhether it's a box-set binge or a movie marathon, these soft and secure headphones are optimized for comfortable, long listening-so any family member can sit in total comfort for hours.
Soft ear pads: Soft ear padsDesigned for long wear, the cushioned and comfortable ear pads are perfect for evenings spent relaxing on the sofa.
Secure fitting: Secure fittingThe ear pad twist-and-tilt feature means that the headphones will comfortably fit the whole family-even those with the smallest ears.
Set up, sit back: Set up, sit backOnce these headphones are out of the box, simply connect the transmitter dock to your TV with the supplied cable, and sit back as the headphones sync to the dock.
Easy to charge: Easy to chargeWhen the battery gets low, simply place them back on the receiver cradle to charge.
